title: Agents
taskListDesc: Allow agent to use tasks for assistance or implementation
autoRunDesc: Automatically run commands and MCP tools when using agents
detailNotification: Allow notifications when tasks complete or fail
blacklistDesc: Please inform your Mac's System Settings -> Notifications to get a better user experience when using.
workflowDesc: Run custom n8n, dify, browser automation and other workflows
triggerDesc: Start scheduled tasks to automatically execute agents at specified time rules
cronTooltip: Use Cron expressions to set scheduled task execution time
cronAdvancedDesc: Custom Cron expression (min hour day month week):
cronFormat: Format: min(0-59) hour(0-23) day(1-31) month(1-12) week(0-7)

cronDesc.monthly: Execute on 1st of every month at 9 AM

noTasksAvailable: No task history available. Please create some tasks first
taskTemplateHint: Selecting a task will use its configuration (API config, mode, tools, etc.) as initial settings for the agent
templateConfigApplied: Task configuration has been automatically applied (mode, tools, API config, etc.)
